Title: Design of a versatile voltage based output stage for implantable neural stimulators
Source: Proc. - IEEE Lat. Am. Symp. Circuits Syst., LASCAS
Abstract: © 2010 IEEE.Neural stimulators have the potential of becoming very important devices for the treatment of a wide variety of diseases. One of the major problems with existing stimulators is the limited waveform adjustability. This precludes the use of sophisticated stimulation programs and thereby affects the efficacy of the therapy applied. For this reason a new type of stimulator is required.
